name: A.D.A.M and E.V.E
description:
Systems initialising…

Account “Adam” not found.

Please report to your nearest incubator and await further instruction.

In the unlikely event that a bug eyed, mandible flailing, killer alien should accost you.

Shoot it and don’t ask questions; they won’t.

===================================================
  
Adam and Eve is a PS1 styled top down shooter with robots, babies, and killer aliens that want just want to eat your face. It is a lovely face and it would be a terrible shame if something were to happen to it.  
  
So, give it a download and let us know what you think in the comments below!  

Credits

Code/Design: Aaron Baumbach  
Art/Design: Greg Lee  
Sfx/Music: Dale Smith  
 

Made in 72 hours in UE4 for Ludum Dare 46

===================================================

Post jam - Easier difficulty

* Decreased enemy health
* Increased enemy count
* Improved enemy AI
